article.title: Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC)
article.summary: The Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) of the US Department of the Treasury administers and enforces economic and trade sanctions based on US foreign policy and national security goals.
article.content:
TheOffice of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC)of the US Department of the Treasury administers and enforces economic and trade sanctions based on US foreign policy and national security goals against targeted foreign countries, terrorists, international narcotics traffickers, and those engaged in activities related to the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction.

Additional Resources

  • Recent OFAC Actions
  • OFAC Guidance by Industry
  • OFAC RSS Feed
